column5: Has anyone fished rice lake? Dad has wanted to go there for years so I decided to take him this year we will be there the first weekend in june. Any info for this time of year will help alot we will be fishing for gills and try for some walleye. Thanks in advance!!
Are you talking about the Rice Lake just east of Toronto?
Are you talking about the Rice Lake just east of Toronto?
We went a few years ago Anglers retreat nice place good fishing if you know how to fish weeds. "Hit it right in the middle of a heat wave.Hot Hot HOt
We went a few years ago Anglers retreat nice place good fishing if you know how to fish weeds. "Hit it right in the middle of a heat wave.Hot Hot HOt

Repost this question a bit closer to trip time and i'll let you know how the fishing is going then. I live just off the lake and hopefully will have some time on the water this spring to give you a better idea of what the fish are doing by then.
